seed_data_creation: Created test appointments via Playwright on Feb 25. Cleaned up TEST_ prefixed data after tests.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All appuntamenti features verified and working: 1) Calendar click opens appointment modal 2) Save creates Appuntamento type with ðŸ“ž icon 3) Stats shown in calendar header and dashboard 4) Legend includes Appuntamento. Bug fix confirmed: cognome field now optional in Cliente model. Existing appuntamento in DB: ID 4 (Appuntamento Mario Rossi on 15/02/2026).
